meta.description: Optimize the number of meals delivered using electric bikes and scooters under charge and vehicle constraints.

sets.name: VEHICLES
sets.description: Types of electric vehicles used for delivery

params.name: capacity
params.description: Number of meals each vehicle can hold

params.name: charge
params.description: Units of charge required by each vehicle

vars.name: num_vehicles
vars.description: Number of each type of vehicle used

objective.name: max_meals_delivered
objective.description: Maximize the total number of meals delivered

constraints.name: charge_limit
constraints.description: Total charge used by vehicles must not exceed available charge

constraints.name: bike_limit
constraints.description: At most 30% of the vehicles can be bikes

constraints.name: min_scooters
constraints.description: At least 20 scooters must be used
